remarks: A Dirichlet character takes values inside the unit circle.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 3-May-2016.)
statement:
dchrabs2.g $e |- G = ( DChr ` N ) $.
dchrabs2.d $e |- D = ( Base ` G ) $.
dchrabs2.z $e |- Z = ( Z/nZ ` N ) $.
dchrabs2.b $e |- B = ( Base ` Z ) $.
dchrabs2.x $e |- ( ph -> X e. D ) $.
dchrabs2.a $e |- ( ph -> A e. B ) $.
dchrabs2 $p |- ( ph -> ( abs ` ( X ` A ) ) <_ 1 ) $.
